subject: Greetings to you my Dear Michelle/Money Gram Money Transfer Worldwide
body:
Money Gram Money Transfer Worldwide
Payment Order File. MG/2023/2024

Dear Customer Mechelle

We are here to inform you about our final conclusion to commence your
compensation payment through Money Gram Transfer at maximum of $10,000
daily until your $1.5 Million USD is completely transferred to you
accordingly.

I'm the accountant officer Mr. Johnson Uba and have been resigned as
the Director of supervision on your 2024 year auditing program and has
signed your installment payment with first $5,000 transfer in your
name today and need you to contact us back on email or call below
phone number with your Valid ID, mobile phone number to verify your
name with Ref: 54460297 and post your first $10,000 transfer available
for pickup in your city within 5mins.

Name: Mr.Chris Vin
Email: Vannistelo@gmail.com
TEL: +229 68608776

So hasten up and give the agent a call to process your payment at
once. Ask him for the Ref sender name to pick up your first payment of
$10,000.Once again congratulations.

Thanks for your patient and cooperation.

We give you best of our services

Dr.Johnson Uba
Director of supervision, 2024 Auditing Program.
